Package org.missions.objective

Interface ObjectiveType

All Superinterfaces:
Category
All Known Subinterfaces:
ActionType, BlockActionType, OperationType, TriggerType
All Known Implementing Classes:
EventTriggerType, MatchAllOperationType, SpawnBlockActionType
public interface ObjectiveType extends Category
A objective type is a type of node that is within the mission, this could be a action (example: where something get spawned in), or a trigger (example: something needs to occur), etc.

Each objective type should be able to save and load its own objectives as well as supply a builder to which a objective can be built.

Each objective type should be registered within the ObjectiveTypes class

    • deserialize

      @NotNull @NotNull Objective<?> deserialize​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode node, @NotNull @NotNull MissionBuilder builder) throws org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException, ParseException
      The ability to load a objective of this type
      Parameters:
      node - The node that you wish to load from
      builder - The missionBuilder to insert this objective into eventually
      Returns:
      A objective of this type with all values accounted for
      Throws:
      org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException - Thrown if getting a object cannot be retrieved the node, or child of the node
      ParseException - Thrown if all config values could be received, but couldn't be parsed
